Sets or clears the resource link in the pause menu.

== Syntax ==
: <code>resourceuri</code>
: <code>resourceuri clear</code>
:: Clears the resource link.
: <code>resourceuri default [uri: text]</code>
:: Sets the resource link's URI, the button text is by default.
: <code>resourceuri named <name: string> [uri: text]</code>
:: Sets the resource link.

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|name: string|basic_string}}
: Specifies the resource link's button text.
: {{arg desc|be=basic_string}}

{{argument|be=1|uri: text|CommandRawText}}
: Specifies the resource link's URI, defaults to empty.
: {{arg desc|be=CommandRawText}}
